forms.title: Straw Poll Form
forms._form:
[section_break section_break-267 "Straw Poll"] [checkbox checkbox-341 use_label_element "Crime & Justice" "Culture" "Environment" "Family & Equality" "Health" "Education" "Immigration" "Infrastructure" "Labor and Business" "Military & Defense" "Taxes & Economy" "Pension & Benefits" ] [radio radio-309 use_label_element "18-24" "25-34" "35-45" "46+"] [radio radio-310 use_label_element "High school" "Associate degree (e.g. AA, AS)" "Bachelor’s degree (e.g. BA, BS)" "Master’s degree (e.g. MA, MS, MEd)" "Professional degree (e.g. MD, DDS, DVM)" "Doctorate (e.g. PhD, EdD)"]
[submit "Submit"]

_mail_2.subject: [_site_title] "[your-subject]"

This email is a receipt for your contact form submission on our website ([_site_title] [_site_url]) in which your email address was used. If that was not you, please ignore this message.
